Layout and style comps for Thomas Publishing

Comps built in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop

Marketing Blog

Thomas Publishing was planning to start a subscription-based news blog for business professionals in manufacturing.

Comps

I built dozens of comps in Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator to show ideas for layout and style.

Layout and style comps

I worked in-house at Thomas Publishing Company to create dozens of layout variations in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop to assist planners at Thomas Publishing to envision their service.

This comp was probably built in Adobe Illustrator, but I am adept at both software platforms and often integrate both in one design.

At Thomas Publishing Company I fluctuated between the two, looking for design options that marketing planners might choose.
